name: Interview (Scared Square Games)
description:
Once upon a time I was invited to interview for a position as a University Lecturer in Game Design. I was asked to do a presentation, so instead of creating a series of boring PowerPoint slides, I made a playable game!

Now, this playable interview presentation has been made available for you to try out for yourself. Would you hire me?

WARNING! The game itself is very buggy and needs to be played a certain way in order to work correctly. If you get stuck, watch the video above.
